scripts.flask-dev: cd ../../backend && pip3 install poetry && poetry install && poetry run python -m recipes_backend_server
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "pnpm run next-dev" "pnpm run flask-dev"
scripts.flask-start: cd ../../backend && pip3 install poetry && poetry install && poetry run waitress-serve --host localhost --port 9422 "recipes_backend_server:app"
scripts.start: npx concurrently "pnpm run next-start" "pnpm run flask-start"
